Question
========
Which file is used to configure a Quarto website project?

Answerlist
----------
* index.qmd
* quarto.yml
* _quarto.yml
* site.json

Solution
========
Quarto websites are configured in the `_quarto.yml` file.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
